channel.title: Functions on Fore Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Functions on Fore Documentation

item.title: Functions
item.description: Functions An overview of all functions available in Fore. XPath Functions As Fore uses XPath 3.1 as its expression language you also have access to the large library of functions that are defined by the standard. XPath 3 function reference Not 100% of the XPath 3.1 functions are available in fontoXPath. There are a few that might not be (fully) implemented. In doubt please refer to their github page or test in their wonderful fontoXPath playground.
